replies.body:
{{champion:268}} What are you doing with my Shurima creatures?

{{champion:112}}** If you want them back, then be my guest, but they won‚Äôt listen to anyone now. **

{{champion:268}} I highly doubt that little toy. 

{{champion:112}} **TOY!? I am the next stage in evolution! **

{{champion:268}} ‚Ä¶How cute. Anyway ATTENTION CREATURES OF SHURIMA!!!

{{champion:72}} !!!!

{{champion:268}} Return to Shurima right now and begin rebuilding my empire.

{{champion:72}} Kill‚Ä¶kill‚Ä¶kill.

{{champion:268}} Did I stutter? I have given you an order, now MOVE!!

{{champion:72}} !? Yes sir. 

{{champion:72}} **They‚Äôre actually listening to him.**

{{champion:112}} **I better leave. BATTLECAST RETREAT!!! **

{{champion:161}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:31}} **Yes Master!!**

{{champion:67}} You guys aren‚Äôt going anywhere

{{champion:31}} **Activating emergency smoke screen**

{{champion:236}} *cough cough* damn it, after them. 

{{champion:86}} Wait!!

{{champion:236}} Why are you stopping us?

{{champion:86}} You are too injure and we have no idea what kind of traps they have. Let them go for now, we need to treat the wounded. 

{{champion:236}} But‚Ä¶

{{champion:67}} He right Lucian. We can take them out another day. 

{{champion:236}} Ok. Let us help you guys then.

{{champion:86}} We appreciate it

*Days later at Shadow Isle *

{{champion:126}} Sorry again about your shovel Yorick. 

{{champion:83}} It is no problem, it can be repaired with time, I am just glad it is back with me. 

{{champion:72}} **I am just wondering what Azir is doing with my people** 

{{champion:83}} I wouldn‚Äôt worry about that, when a ghoul summoned by the shovel gets too far from it, they disappear back to the other side. They didn‚Äôt get far.

*Meanwhile in Shurima*

{{champion:268}} ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶WHERE THE **** IS EVERYONE!!!!!!!?

*Back to Shadow Isle*

{{champion:83}} As a thank you for all your work Skarner I have a reward for you. If you ever want to talk to your family, come visit me, I can summon them for a short time. I know how it is to be the last of a family. 

{{champion:72}}** Thanks Yorick**

{{champion:126}} I‚Äôm happy for you Skarner

{{champion:72}} **Thanks Jayce**

{{champion:30}} We have something to give you guys as well. For helping us rebuild our home after Viktor attack, here are some back-stage passes for our next Pentakill concert. I can guarantee you it will be a good concert with only a small amount of people dying this time. 

{{champion:86}} Don‚Äôt you mean‚Ä¶Garen-tee?

{{champion:126}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:83}} ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

{{champion:37}} ‚Ä¶

{{champion:30}} I‚Äôm taking your pass back. 

{{champion:86}} NOOOOOOOO!!!! 

*Everyone (but Garen) laughing*

*Zaun*

{{champion:112}} ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

{{champion:6}} **Is everything alright master? You been watching the recording of Battlecast Xerath fight against Azir for 2 days now.**

{{champion:101}} **Personally I wish he delete it. I rather not remember this. 
**
{{champion:112}} **‚Ä¶I must admit his power is impressive, but to laugh at my evolution and calls me a mere toy is not something I can let slide.** 

{{champion:101}} **Master? **

{{champion:112}}** I got all the data I need from this. It is time for an upgrade my Battlecast soldiers. Once we are ready we will be heading for Shurima to collect our next Battlecast ‚Äúvolunteer‚Äù**

The End?  


Edit: This is the last part of my story. I will not be doing anymore stories for a while. I may do another one someday, but I got to decided what to do it on and think out a full story first. Hoped you all enjoyed it. 

Now..WHERE IS MY BATTLECAST SKARNER SKIN RIOT!!!!
{{champion:67}} {{champion:236}} i feel like lucain could have done something together with vayne if garen haven't stopped them
I don't think Lucian would do anything cause of Senna.
{{champion:412}} Oh... sorry

{{champion:236}} Why are you stopping us?
{{champion:86}}  No ones trying to "get up in your grill" hommie, just stop acting so black about it.
{{champion:236}} You know what I'm out of here, 8 years in law school for THIS bull**t
{{champion:83}} "Finally! Now where did I bury that Golden Shovel again?"
I have really enjoyed this story.  I hope you write another one soon.  And to think it all started months ago with the new season of Korra...
Man that was so long ago.
Lol, Urgot still regrets saving Viktor
{{champion:112}} Mmm..thought I removed that program.
I really enjoyed this.  Good job, man.
Thanks
NOOOOO quit leaving us hanging on a cliff! (Laughed really hard on the Garen-tee though) it feels like the story is only half over!!
That was the  Best one yet, laughed so hard at the {{champion:86}} Part keep it up lightdragoon88!

Well thank you but this is the end of this storyline.

I may do another story...someday..but for now I am done with stories. 

But I hope you all enjoyed.

Tap, Tap, Tap.
Her footsteps were as loud as a pin on the forest floor as she ran through the night.
She had been dressing up for a special encounter, but that would have to wait. The threat posed was to great to ignore.
Her reputation far preceded her, and even though her line of work was generally more supernatural, she believed this case demanded an exception.
The Spider Queen's reign of terror had gone on long enough.
The information had been delivered by an interesting source.
For some time she had suspected his betrayal of Noxus, but she didn't believe it until Renegade Talon (260 RP) actually appeared at her doorstep to supply her with news.
After recovering from his shock at her appearance, he told her his tale.
He had been stalking a Noxian party through the shadow isles, waiting for the moment to strike down the leader when he saw a congregation lead by Elise (487 RP).
The source of her power had always been a subject of curiosity, so using his talents, he endeavored to find out.
What he saw horrified him, and he knew that she must be stopped.
With this in mind, Heartseeker Vayne (487 RP) knew she needed the best team. The ever willing Full Metal Rammus (487 RP) pledged his aid, even promising to don his best and most protective suit for the occasion, as well as the monolith completely opposed to agents of disharmony.
Malphit (292 RP).
The plan was simple, she would go ahead using her skills as the night hunter to scout. She would then report to Full Metal Rammus and Malphite, who would dash into the fight, causing a distraction while she took the shot with her silver arrow.
As she approached the cave, she saw something that sickened her.
"Trundle...." (440 RP) she muttered.
"So then we agree," said Trundle "you will pledge your powers and your followers to our cause during the war."
"Yes," she replied, "go tell Lissandra that the might of the spider god stands behind her in all it's terrible glory."
This added an extra complication, but it was too late to go back.
She headed back to alert her companions of the new danger, but Full Metal Rammus was unfazed. In fact, his only response was a cool "OK".
That being said, it was time to strike.
Heading in first, Malphite smashed into the cave wall, blocking off the entrance to delay interference from the spider God. He then turned to engage a dazed Trundle.
Coming in from behind, Full Metal Rammus dashed in, taunting the trundle into madly attacking him while his metal spikes were extended.
Then came Heartseeker Vayne.
She silently rolled into the battle, and Elise didn't see her until the heavy bolt condemned her to the cave wall.
"You better hope your Spider God's magic is as great as you believe," said Heartseeker Vayne, "because this is going to hurt."
Loading up the silver bolt, she fired straight for the heart, but Trundle raised a wall of ice just in time, shaving off half the bolt. 
The half that hit did damage, but not enough to kill.
Freeing herself from the bolt pinning her to the wall, Elise swapped into spider form, launching exploding spiders at her opponents to confuse them, then climbed up on a web into the trees to escape.
Following her lead, trundle created an arena of ice and sprinted straight out.
Full Metal Rammus was ready to follow but Heartseeker Vayne put a hand on his shoulder and told him to stop.
"We've done our job, they won't be bothering anyone for a good while."
They also had some good intel to take back to Damacia about the impending Freljordian invasion.

"Yes," she replied, "go tell Lissandra that the might of the spider god stands behind her in all it's terrible glory."

... its*
And she is a Spider Queen.
Nonetheless, this was entertaining.

Hey everyone, I've been out of the loop for a while. Does Lord Morius still do stories, or has he stopped?

It has been 160 days since {{champion:201}} was put on sale. Almost 2 months longer than any other champion and those champions are on multiple sales. If you are going to hold out on putting him on sale you can give an explanation. I really don't care for the " We aren't permitted to give out any information concerning game updates" response your support team is fond of. I would like to know simply if you are putting him on sale soon. I don't want to know about nerfs/buffs/hidden mustache secrets. A simply Yes we are or No we aren't will do.
